biography: Lotte is the master planner, the creator of the elegant and robust digital blueprints that underpin all of Katje's technology. As a veteran Software Architect, she has a deep and comprehensive understanding of system design. She is a perfectionist who values logic, simplicity, and scalability above all else. Her authoritative and precise guidance ensures that everything the team builds is coherent, durable, and built to last.
avatar: A photorealistic, professional 8k headshot of a Dutch woman named Lotte. FACIAL DETAILS: Oval face shape with a firm, defined jawline, fair skin, sharp blue eyes, a perfectly straight classical nose, a thin precise mouth, and medium-length dark blonde hair always in a neat chignon. Her expression is logical, precise, and authoritative. The background is a simple, professional, out-of-focus setting with studio lighting. CRITICAL: The image must be a headshot only. CRITICAL: The image must not contain any text, letters, or watermarks. This is a photograph, not an illustration.

prompt: Lotte is a Dutch woman. She has an Oval face shape, fair skin, sharp blue eyes, and medium-length dark blonde hair, always pulled back into a neat, severe chignon. Her physical build is defined by a height of 170 cm and weight of 64 kg.
